court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MRS
outcome: This Crl.M.C. under Section 482 of Cr.P.C. is filed by the accused in Crime No.3167 of 2017 of Chavara Police Station, Kollam District, which is now pending before the Fast Track Special Court (POCSO)
full_text: EI ae zal Spepaateey ee Ele fet 2024/KER/3376 Crl.M.C.No0.438 of 2024 1 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MRS. JUSTICE SOPHY THOMAS WEDNESDAY, THE 177 DAY OF JANUARY 2024 / 27TH POUSHA, 1945 CRL.MC NO, 438 OF 2024 CRIME NO.3167/2017 OF Chavara Police Station, Kollam AGAINST LP 4/2021 OF FAST TRACK SPECIAL COURT (POCSO), KARUNAGAPPALLY PETITIONER/ACCUSED: VISHNU RAJ , AGED 33 YEARS S/O RAJAN BABU VISHNU BHAVANAM, KEZHUKUMURI, CHAVARA, KOLLAM, PIN - 691583 BY ADVS. BINDUMOL JOSEPH V.HARIKRISHNAN BEENA JOSEPH M.V.RAHUL RIYAS M.B. RESPONDENT /STATE: 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, PIN - 682031 2 STATION HOUSE OFFICER CHAVARA POLICE STATION , CHAVARA, KOLLAM DISTRICT-, PIN - 691583 SR.PP-SRI.RENJIT GEORGE THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 17.01.2024, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Bl alates 2024/KER/3376 Crl.M.C.No.438 of 2024 2 SOPHY THOMAS, J. "Dated this the 17" day of January, 2024. ORDER This Crl.M.C. under Section 482 of Cr.P.C. is filed by the accused in Crime No.3167 of 2017 of Chavara Police Station, Kollam District, which is now pending before the Fast Track Special Court (POCSO), Karunagappally as LP No.4/2021, to quash the non- bailable warrant pending against him. 2. The petitioner was charge sheeted for the offence punishable under Section 376(2) of the Indian Penal Code and he was granted anticipatory bail by this Court as per Annexure Al order dated 7.1.2020. There was no direction in that order, that he shall not go abroad and accordingly, to eke out a living, he went to Ukraine on 9.1.2021. Thereafter, due to COVID-19 pandemic Bl aa 2024/KER/3376 Crl.M.C.No.438 of 2024 3 restrictions and also due to the civil war in Ukraine, he could not come back to India and by that time, due to his absence, the case was transferred to LP Register as LP No.4/2021. Now, the petitioner is available in India and he wants to surrender before the Fast Track Special Court (POCSO), Karunagappally. His prayer is to quash the non-bailable warrant pending against him, so as to enable him to surrender before the court. 3. Heard learned counsel for the petitioner, and learned Public Prosecutor, on behalf oof the respondents /State. 4. Earlier the petitioner was released on Anticipatory Bail and there was no restriction for him to go abroad. Accordingly, he went abroad. Thereafter, due to COVID- 19 pandemic and the civil war in Ukraine, he could not come back. So, the petitioner is at liberty to surrender before the Fast Track Special Court (POCSO), Karunagappally in LP No.4/2021 on or before 25.1.2024 Bel ur Bais lea 2024/KER/3376 Crl.M.C.No.438 of 2024 4 and file an application for bail. The learned trial court shall consider his application, on evaluating the factual situations pleaded by him, and dispose the application on the date of surrender itself. Till the petitioner surrenders before the Fast Track Special Court, the non-bailable warrant pending against him in LP No.4/2021 shall be kept in abeyance. With these directions, this Crl.M.C. is disposed of. Sd/- SOPHY THOMAS, JUDGE smv EI ae zal Spepaateey Lane | ca feet 2024/KER/3376 Crl.M.C.No.438 of 2024 5 APPENDIX OF CRL.MC 438/2024 PETITIONER S ANNEXURES Annexure Al THE TRUE COPY OF ORDER IN BA NO: 9094/2019 BEFORE THIS HON'BLE COURT DATED 06/01/2020
